name: React Pic Game
desc: Clicky memory game. Click on each picture only once to win! Click the same picture twice and you lose!

name: Pokemon Hangman
desc: Who's that pokemon? Guess the Pokemon within 9 tries to win!

name: Mongo News Scraper
desc: Scrape the news with this website! You can save an article, make a note on the article, and delete the article
lang: Cheerio, morgan, body-parser, Handlebars, MongoDB, Express, Node

name: BLACK List To Do List
desc: The BLACK list is a to do list to make your life easier. You can sign in, save your list, edit and delete tasks on your list. Future updates include using the graph page to track your productivity by showing you how many lists and tasks you complete weekly
lang: ReactJS, Node, Express, MySQL, Heroku, OAuth,

name: Crystal Collector Game
desc: Each game starts with 4 crystals all with different values. You need to figure out those hidden values to match the winning number. Game resets on refresh

name: GIPHY API Search
desc: Search and view your favorite GIFs. Start off by clicking a tab to generate 10 gifs, or use the search bar to generate your own gifs! Click on a gif to start and stop the gif.
lang: GIPHY API, HTML, CSS, Jquery, Ajax

name: Train Sceduler
desc: Keep track of your own trains with this train tracker. Data put in the forms is saved in a Firebase Database

name: Exbae
desc: Buy and Sell stuff from past and broken relationships with this Amazon/Ebay-like storefront. You can view the customer store front, or manage the store with the exbaemanager file

name: Liri
desc: Liri, the Siri Clone. Ask Liri questions in the command line and get info quick!
lang: Node, Express, Twitter API, Spotify API

name: Burger App
desc: Create a burger, and then eat it in this burger creating and managing app

name: Cowboy Bebop Trivia Game
desc: Test your trivia knowledge in this timed Cowboy Bebop trivia game

name: Friend Finder
desc: Take a survey and get matched with people who have similar tastes as you

name: MUC App
desc: Take part in a local scavenger hunt, focusing in Balboa Park. Visit landmarks and take a picture within their vicinity on the map witin the circle to complete the clue!
lang: Clarifai API, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Jquery, Google Maps API, Firebase
